p: The human breast cancer cell line MDA-MB-231 was purchased from Cell Bank of Typical Culture Preservation Committee, Chinese Academy of Sciences, Shanghai (Shanghai, China). Cells were cultured in Leibovitz's L15 medium supplemented with 10% (v/v) FBS, 100 U/mL of penicillin, and 100 μg/mL streptomycin at 37°C.
